data.title: state of play: extracts from the exchange of views with Guy VERHOFSTADT (Renew, BE), EP Brexit Steering group's coordinator
data.meta_description: During a meeting of the EP Committee on Constitutional Affairs (CONT), MEPs exchange views with Guy VERHOFSTADT (Renew, BE), EP Brexit Steering group's coordinator on the withdrawal of the UK from the European Unionâ€“ state of play in the European Parliament in Brussels. Extracts from the exchange of views.
data.text: The withdrawal of the UK from the European Union - state of play: extracts from the exchange of views with Guy VERHOFSTADT (Renew, BE), EP Brexit Steering group's coordinator
